name: Angry Capitalist
description:
Angry Capitalist

Take your revenge as the last survivor of the robot invasion ! Force them to work to death and if they try to escape, whip them !

The game is still in development. This is my first time making a game with Phaser so I still have some issues with colliders and the character's health bar management. To make the game easier, try to slide while pressing the spacebar when attacking the robots !

Made for the Indie Game Dev Beginners #003 game jam.
